reviewText:
Received the item in brand new shape and on a very timely basis. We were very pleased with the tape.

Thanks
MHooper

I am a seller for this VHS. I would like to provide additional information, which is shown on cover of the tape:
"Devised and perfected by leading specialist in the field of eye care and sports medicine.
A series of four highly successful video exercises designed to improve your life through better use of your visual skills.
The E.I.S. requires only 15 minutes a day, just 3 times a week. The simple exercises are designed to make improving your eyesight easy and enjoyable in the privacy of your home or office at your convenience."
